message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. I think it's a fair price considering its value and quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value and quality of the product you're selling. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $120. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $180. It's a fair price considering the value and quality of the product. I'm open to further negotiations, but I need to make sure I get a good deal.

Hello Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your offer, but I still believe we can find a price that suits both of us. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $150. This still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the product.
